rukus.text: By the scattering (winds) that scatters
and by the carriers of a heavy load (of rain)
and by the (ships) sailing with ease
and by the distributor of affair (the angels)
what you are promised is certainly true
and the judgment is certainly a reality
And by the sky having pathways (and orbits)
indeed you are of different opinion
Anyone who is deviated, he is deviated from it (Quran and the truth)
Death to the liars (and conjecturers)
Those who are neglectful in a flood (of ignorance)
They ask: when is the judgment day
A day that they are tortured over the fire
Taste (the result of) your trial, this is what you used to want it in a hurry
Indeed those who control themselves are in gardens and springs
Taking what their Master gave them. Indeed they were good doers before this
They used to sleep a little of the night
and they ask forgiveness by the dawns
and there was a (portion) in their wealth due for the beggars and the disadvantaged
And there are signs for those who are certain on the earth
and in yourselves. Do you not see
And your provision and what you are promised is in the sky
By the Master of the skies and the earth, it is certainly true, same as (it is true that) you speak
